DefaultGraphs.name: Graph 1
DefaultGraphs.query: SELECT COUNT(CI.LETRA) AS NumeroDeCasosEfermedadesRespiratorias,CI.Letra,DI.CalendarYear as Year,CL.Asentamiento AS Colonia,CL.Nombre_De_La_Localidad FROM [SEDESA].[SAEH].[Defunciones] AS DE INNER JOIN [Catalogos].[DimDate] AS DI ON DE.Id_DimDate=DI.DateKey INNER JOIN [Catalogos].[Cat_CLUES] AS CL ON DE.[Id_CLUE]=CL.Id_CLUE INNER JOIN [Catalogos].[Cat_CIE] AS CI ON DE.Id_CIE=CI.Id_CIE WHERE CI.Letra='{letter}' GROUP BY CL.Asentamiento,CI.Letra,DI.CalendarYear,CL.Nombre_De_La_Localidad order by 3,1 desc

SavedGraph.query: SELECT COUNT(CI.LETRA) AS NumeroDeCasosEfermedadesRespiratorias,CI.Letra,DI.CalendarYear as Year,CL.Asentamiento AS Colonia,CL.Nombre_De_La_Localidad FROM [SEDESA].[SAEH].[Defunciones] AS DE INNER JOIN [Catalogos].[DimDate] AS DI ON DE.Id_DimDate=DI.DateKey INNER JOIN [Catalogos].[Cat_CLUES] AS CL ON DE.[Id_CLUE]=CL.Id_CLUE INNER JOIN [Catalogos].[Cat_CIE] AS CI ON DE.Id_CIE=CI.Id_CIE WHERE CI.Letra='{letter}' GROUP BY CL.Asentamiento,CI.Letra,DI.CalendarYear,CL.Nombre_De_La_Localidad order by 3,1 desc
SavedGraph.name: Graph 1
